decrypter/aes.js

decrypter/aes.js This file contains an adaptation of the AES decryption algorithm from the Standford Javascript Cryptography Library. decrypter/decrypter.js

decrypter/decrypter.js An asynchronous implementation of AES-128 CBC decryption with PKCS#7 padding.

decrypter/index.js

decrypter/index.js Index module to easily import the primary components of AES-128 decryption. Like this: ```js import {Decrypter, decrypt, AsyncStream} from './src/decrypter'; ```

m3u8/index.js

m3u8/index.js Utilities for parsing M3U8 files. If the entire manifest is available, `Parser` will create an object representation with enough detail for managing playback. `ParseStream` and `LineStream` are lower-level parsing primitives that do not assume the entirety of the manifest is ready and expose a ReadableStream-like interface.
Source:
  • m3u8/index.js, line 1
